function:
def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)

    Thought 2: The absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance can also portray the imbalance in distance distribution.
    New Feature 2: distance_difference | distance_difference = abs(Left-Distance - Right-Distance)
    
    Thought 3: The ratio of Left-Weight to Left-Distance and Right-Weight to Right-Distance might give an indication of the balance.
    New Feature 3: left_ratio | left_ratio = Left-Weight / Left-Distance
    New Feature 4: right_ratio | right_ratio = Right-Weight / Right-Distance
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Distance and Right-Distance
    df_output['distance_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Distance'] - df_output['Right-Distance'])
    
    # Calculate ratio of Left-Weight to Left-Distance
    df_output['left_ratio'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] / df_output['Left-Distance']
    
    # Calculate ratio of Right-Weight to Right-Distance
    df_output['right_ratio'] = df_output['Right-Weight'] / df_output['Right-Distance']
    
    return df_output
